verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2298>marvelous<s%>, <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> is filled <S%G5055>up<s%> the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>mirror<s%> <S%G3396>mingled<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> them that had gotten the <S%G3528>victory<s%> <S%G1537>over<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>over<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>over<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5480>mark<s%>, and <S%G1537>over<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>, <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>mirror<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2788>harps<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G103>sang<s%> the <S%G5603>song<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5603>song<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G3173>Great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> are <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty<s%>; <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> are <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%>, you <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G40>saints<s%>.

<S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G5399>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%>, O <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>? <S%G3754>for<s%> you <S%G3441>only<s%> are <S%G3741>holy<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1345>judgments<s%> are made <S%G5319>manifest<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5023>that<s%> I <S%G1492>looked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%>, clothed <S%G1746>in<s%> <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2986>white<s%> <S%G3043>linen<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> having <S%G4012>their<s%> <S%G4738>breasts<s%> <S%G4024>girded<s%> with <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2223>belts<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>animals<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G5357>vials<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, who <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G1072>filled<s%> with <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G5055>fulfilled<s%>.
